title: Gold Slides Below $5,000 as Lunar New Year Holiday Mutes Trade

title: Lacking Money, Russia Turns to God in Push for African Influence
summary: The apricot-hued building with its curved dome proclaims its affiliation with the Moscow Patriarchate of the Russian Orthodox Church on a sign in Afrikaans.  The interior is adorned with icons, rugs and candle stands, things more familiar to a place of worship in, say, St. Petersburg than South Africa’s Western Cape.  The continent has long been a target for Russia.

title: Stocks, Bonds Fluctuate in Holiday-Thinned Trade: Markets Wrap

With the US observing the Presidents’ Day holiday and mainland China’s markets closed for Lunar New Year holidays, trading volumes were thin.
